description: T1 Multi-stemmed Yew tree to the middle of the lawn area to the right of the house - Dismantle in sections to near ground level.T2 Beech tree adjacent to the rear right boundary with significant basal decay evident - Dismantle in sections to near ground level. T3 - 6 3no. Lawson Cypress trees & 1no. Yew tree to the right of T2 - Dismantle in sections to near ground level.	 T7 Dead/declining Ivy covered Lawson Cypress stem to the right of T3-6 - Dismantle in sections to near ground level (retaining 1no. Lawson Cypress within this group).T8 Yew tree to the right of T7 - Trim overall by approximately 0.5m to shape and tidy.T9 Holly the left of T2 - Trim overall by approximately 0.5m to shape and tidy.G10 Small group of Thuja trees to the left of T9 - Trim/reduce the tops and all sides evenly to form these trees in to a short formal hedge.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
